Package sample

Class WeatherStation

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.WeatherStation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observable
    public class WeatherStation
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observable
    Class to collecting information about weather condition in different cities around the world and storing in proper array.

      • addWeatherValues

        public void addWeatherValues​(java.lang.String city)
        Method adding weather parameters such as temperature, atmospheric pressure, humidity, maximum temperature and minimum temperature, which are loaded from OpenWeather server to the empty array.
        Parameters:
        city - Name of the city from which we want to collect weather parameters.
        See Also:
        Observer

      • getListOfWeatherParametres

        public java.util.ArrayList<com.google.gson.JsonElement> getListOfWeatherParametres()
        Gets array with weather parameters saved in Json format.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList that contains weather parameters saved in Json format.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - when array is empty.
